Organization: Laboratório de Hidráulica Computacional, Escola de Engenharia de São Carlos, Universidade de São Paulo
SourceDescription: The data are collected and made available by the LHC-EESC-USP, which is a research group based in São Carlos (Brazil) and is part of the Department of Hydraulics and Sanitation (University of São Paulo). Technicians, undergraduate students, graduate students, and professors collaborate in the maintenance of monitoring sites, equipment, databases.
